main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Thule AFB, Greenland on September 31, 1958. The object was described as the size of a star with a blue blinking light, disappearing for 10-15 seconds and then reappearing, and estimated to have a speed of 1500 to 1800 knots before disappearing instantly.
interesting points: The UFO was observed by military personnel, including the aircraft commander, co-pilot, and navigator of the 4287th Air Transport Squadron.
The sighting was of an object that appeared on the northern horizon, travelled overhead heading 63 degrees to the west at a very fast speed.
The report states 'insufficient data for evaluation' and mentions the possibility of a balloon or satellite, with potential errors in speed or duration of the sighting.
The document also requests a preliminary investigation to obtain more specific information concerning the sighting, indicating the seriousness with which it was taken.
There is discrepancy in the timing of the sighting, with the original report indicating a different time from the command post log.
sighted object: Unknown object with a blue blinking light
